//notes: technically its title is EvolV compensator, but we ignore this for the sake of sanity
description: A slim compensator.  Twelve holes along its front vent exhaust gases upon firing, negating most of the muzzle rise.

variants.description: A slim compensator, with the holes along its front venting gases in six directions.  Will install flush with an M4-profile barrel.  <variant:black>

//integral_longest_side: absorbs 16 mm of regular threading on a 1/2 in. × 24-threaded barrel
//handling_modifier: we use Strike Industries J-Comp as the reference, with its 60.48% recoil reduction
